mapper.insert: insert into prtcmember ( memberId, boardId ) values (#{memberId}, #{boardId})
mapper.select: select prtcMemberId, memberId, boardId from prtcmember where memberId = #{memberId} and boardId = #{boardId}
select prtcmember.boardId, title, date, memCount, dueDate, curCount from prtcmember, board where prtcMember.boardId = board.boardId and prtcmember.memberId=#{memberId}
mapper.update: update prtcmember set memberId=#{memberId}, boardId=#{boardId} where prtcMemberId=#{prtcMemberId}
mapper.delete: delete from prtcmember where boardId = #{boardId} and memberId=#{memberId}
